Changelog for jlle
==================

0.1.4 (2014-04-26)
------------------

- Use py.test instead of nose.


0.1.3 (2014-03-16)
------------------

- Default docs theme is now the read the docs theme.


0.1.2 (2013-12-08)
------------------

- Bugfix in documentation template.


0.1.1 (2013-12-06)
------------------

- Ignore Python bytecode files when a new project is created.


0.1.0 (2013-12-05)
------------------

- Initial release
